attributes.action: Make available ALL census records and abolish the 100 year rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the giuse of data protection, census records are blocked for 100 years. This is not the case in other European countries, under the same data protection guises. France for instance has their 2007 census readily available. Stop the commercialism of information held on our behalf
